text: Allah apeleeche chilandanyo chaŵandu makafili pa ŵankwao Nuhu ni ŵankwao Lutwi, ŵanaŵaŵiliŵa ŵaliji pasi pa achikapolo ŵaŵili mwa achikapolo Ŵetu ŵambone, nambo ŵaatesile chinyengo (achiŵammakwaowo pakusisa ukafili mu ntima ni kamulana ni amagongo), basi (Achimitumeo) nganiŵakamuchisya (achiŵammakwaowo) chilichose mu (ipotesi) yakuumila kwa Allah, ni yaŵechetedwe (yanti): “Jinjilani ku Moto pamo ni akwinjila.”
